statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureDataDisk)-[:ATTACHED_TO]->(:AzureVirtualMachine)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureDataDisk)-[r:ATTACHED_TO]->(:AzureVirtualMachine)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureVirtualMachine)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AzureVirtualMachine)-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
